name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-channel-group-sso-quickstart-ts
title: Starter solution: Channel/Group tab with SSO in TypeScript
shortDescription: This sample application illustrates Microsoft Entra SSO authentication in Teams channel tabs, enabling secure access to user profiles and collaborative web content.
longDescription: This application showcases how to implement Microsoft Entra SSO authentication within channel tabs in Microsoft Teams, facilitating seamless user profile access and collaborative spaces.
